title: I wish post smokers were more honest about why they want it to be legal.
body: I see all these millennial pot-smoking bums talking about "weed helps ppl go through pain," which I don't disagree with, but these degenerates shouldn't feign empathy. They don't have any or they wouldn't be doing marijuana in the first place. The REAL reason these people want it to be legal is for themselves.  Just be honest is all I ask.
